body_html: Yes, this will only work with 0.2.3+ (see https://groups.google.com/d/msg/bazel-discuss/_Xo14sf7fHw/g7wdatTGBgAJ for more info about the change). For this to work with older versions, I can make it check both paths and use whichever exists.
body_text: Yes, this will only work with 0.2.3+ (see https://groups.google.com/d/msg/bazel-discuss/_Xo14sf7fHw/g7wdatTGBgAJ for more info about the change).  For this to work with older versions, I can make it check both paths and use whichever exists.
body: Yes, this will only work with 0.2.3+ (see https://groups.google.com/d/msg/bazel-discuss/_Xo14sf7fHw/g7wdatTGBgAJ for more info about the change).  For this to work with older versions, I can make it check both paths and use whichever exists.
